code: export var getMovieStart=function getMovieStart(){return{type:"GET_MOVIE_START"};};export var getMovieSuccess=function getMovieSuccess(movie){return{type:"GET_MOVIE_SUCCESS",payload:movie};};export var getMovieFailure=function getMovieFailure(){return{type:"GET_MOVIE_FAILURE"};};export var getMoviesStart=function getMoviesStart(){return{type:"GET_MOVIES_START"};};export var getMoviesSuccess=function getMoviesSuccess(movies){return{type:"GET_MOVIES_SUCCESS",payload:movies};};export var getMoviesFailure=function getMoviesFailure(){return{type:"GET_MOVIES_FAILURE"};};export var createMovieStart=function createMovieStart(){return{type:"CREATE_MOVIE_START"};};export var createMovieSuccess=function createMovieSuccess(movie){return{type:"CREATE_MOVIE_SUCCESS",payload:movie};};export var createMovieFailure=function createMovieFailure(){return{type:"CREATE_MOVIE_FAILURE"};};export var updateMovieStart=function updateMovieStart(){return{type:"UPDATE_MOVIE_START"};};export var updateMovieSuccess=function updateMovieSuccess(movie){return{type:"UPDATE_MOVIE_SUCCESS",payload:movie};};export var updateMovieFailure=function updateMovieFailure(){return{type:"UPDATE_MOVIE_FAILURE"};};export var deleteMovieStart=function deleteMovieStart(){return{type:"DELETE_MOVIE_START"};};export var deleteMovieSuccess=function deleteMovieSuccess(id){return{type:"DELETE_MOVIE_SUCCESS",payload:id};};export var deleteMovieFailure=function deleteMovieFailure(){return{type:"DELETE_MOVIE_FAILURE"};};
